name: Suicidal-thoughts
tagline: An Android app to help prevent suicides
body:
### Welcome to my litle project to help people in need
I want to write an app to help people who are thinking about commiting suicide. If you want to help me develop this software or help me to fill it with content, please feel free to contact me.

### Support or Contact
If you have any issues with the app, please open a issue on github. So I can make sure that it does not get lost.
If you don't have a github account you can send me an [e-mail](mailto:e-mail@rocketrider.eu).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
